description:
The son of a warrior and student of the Demon King.
He appears to be very enthusiastic when comes to talking about war and slaying demons, but changes his attitude with the knowledge learned from his teacher, and the Female Knight. When the Central Nations start their attack on the Southern Kingdoms, he becomes a commander and manages to use traps and tactics learned from his teacher to stop the surprise attack by the White Nation.
name: Gunjin Shitei
